overview: Mary, a big, stubborn and independent lady, lives with Coyota, her dog, both are sick and Mary lives on the memories of her past with nostalgia. Although she has the support of her daughter and granddaughter, Coyota is her company. Mary must make a difficult decision with Coyota since she sees her getting sicker and sicker and because of her age it is more difficult to care for her
title: Un Encuentro
